name: aria-model-switcher
description: Switch between Ollama models at runtime. GLM for smart text, Qwen3-VL for vision tasks.
author: Aria Team

tools.name: list_models
tools.description: List all available Ollama models and show current active model. Returns installed models with aliases.

tools.name: switch_model
tools.description: Switch to a different Ollama model. Use 'glm' for smart text tasks, 'qwen3-vl' for vision/image tasks.

model.description: Model alias (glm, qwen3-vl, qwen2.5) or full model name

tools.name: pull_model
tools.description: Download/pull a model to Ollama. Use this if a model is not available.

model.description: Model alias or full name to pull

tools.name: get_current_model
tools.description: Get the currently active model name and alias.
